capstone.heading: Robotic Billiards Partner
capstone.description: An autonomous billiards partner than captures the state of the table with a camera, and analyzes the state of the table for the best shot. It then moves to that coordinate and tries to sink a shot.
capstone.contribution: Designed and built the mechanical system which allows the robot to physically perform the shot. We did everything from CAD down to the nuts and bolts, all the way to machining the parts, integrating pneumatics, electrical wiring, and 3D printing. The problem is mechanically tricky since the robot must hit the balls with power and then quickly move out the way, all in a stable and repeatable manner.
